WorkItem.ClosedComment: You can also extend the interface by just writing 'interface Array { ... }' again and writing the new members (although this doesn't work well with the current version of the VS extension - that will be fixed). Thanks!
WorkItem.Description:
Currently some host classes like Array cannot be extended as they are defined as interfaces, which results in:
"A export class may only extend other classes, Array is an interface."

It would be nice if they could be turned into class definitions.

Comments.Message:
Sorry. Ignore, there is already a bug for this:
http://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/13
